name: Handyman From Outer Space
lyric:
There was a little alien named Beezer

Who loved to dance and to play

But sometimes there was work to do
So he scrubbed and he cleaned all day

He polished the rings around Saturn
And spackled the face of the moon
He installed central heating on Pluto
It took him all afternoon
He air conditioned Mercury
And sharpened the dullest stars
He took a meteor shower
Then dusted the planet Mars

He fluffed the clouds around Venus
And juggled Jupiter's moons
Now he'll paint a big smile on the Earth
And go rest in his outer space room

Phew
